医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
了解LSD1在细胞过程和疾病中的作用一项新的综述凸显了LSD1（赖氨酸特异性去甲基酶1）在调节关键细胞过程及其对人类疾病的影响中的关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250308/understanding-the-role-f-lsd1-in-cellular-processes-and-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250308/understanding-the-role-of-lsd1-in-cellular-processes-and-processes-and-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=68FCC307-2E99-415D-BC49-54C569518407 Sat, 08 Mar 2025 11:25:00 -0400 Understanding the role of LSD1 in cellular processes and disease
阐明肺癌中LUAD和LUSC之间的遗传差异肺癌仍然是癌症相关死亡率的主要原因之一，肺腺癌（LUAD）和肺鳞状细胞癌（LUSC）代表非小细胞肺癌（NSCLC）最普遍的亚型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250308/unraveling-the-the-genetic-differences-between-luad-and-and-lusc-in-lung-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250308/unraveling-the-the-genetic-differences-between-luad-and-and-lusc-in-lung-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d456bfdf-4EE2-4B54-AB42-D5411EB6CFC6 Sat, 08 Mar 2025 11:13:00 -0400 Unraveling the genetic differences between LUAD and LUSC in lung cancer
圆形RNA在癌症生物学和治疗中起关键作用一篇新的评论文章强调了循环RNA（Circrna）在癌症中的变革性作用，揭示了其作为肿瘤生物学的关键参与者的潜力，也是对未来疗法的有前途的途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250308/circular-rna-plays-key-reole-incancer-incancer-biology-and-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250308/circular-rna-plays-key-reole-incancer-incancer-biology-biology-and-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ce460383-b8f7-4645-B424-FEC61E50EFD6 Sat, 08 Mar 2025 11:02:49 -0400 Circular RNA plays key role in cancer biology and therapy
研究表明，美国心血管健康的鸿沟不断增长3月6日在柳叶刀区域健康中发表的一项研究强调了美国心血管健康的鸿沟日益增长，表明财富和教育在心脏病风险中起着重要作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250308/study-reveals-growing-divide-in-cardiascular-health-health-health-health-health-in-the-us.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250308/study-reveals-growing-divide-in-cardiascular-health-health-health-health-in-the-us.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d9c94a68-c837-40b6-40b6-8b6-8b0f-2666ae91fed33 Sat, 08 Mar 2025 10:07:00 -0400 Study reveals growing divide in cardiovascular health in the U.S.

研究评估了测试患者遗传癌风险的两种方法多达10％的癌症是由可以通过市售测试轻松检测到的基因引起的。这些包括乳腺癌，卵巢，结肠，胃，子宫和胰腺等常见癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250308/study-assesses-two-ways-two-ways-to-pot-patients-heredared-rashereditary-cancer-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250308/study-assesses-two-ways-to-to-te-pest-patients-patients-heredared-cancer-cancer-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=488888d7cf-370E-4311-A20A-A20A-A20A-A7CFFABF3FB3 Sat, 08 Mar 2025 09:50:00 -0400 Study assesses two ways to test patients' hereditary cancer risks

EZH2抑制作用为抵抗治疗癌症的希望提供了希望EZH2是一种基本表观遗传调节剂EZH2在癌症进展和治疗中的关键作用在基因和疾病发表的这篇新的评论文章中强调。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250308/ezh2-inhibition-offers-hope-for-fighting--fighting-warting-wareatment-wreatment-cancert-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250308/ezh2-inhibition-offers-hope-for-fighting--fighting-warting-wareatment-wreatment-comentant-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0E84B93B-80C3-4A14-A14-A3AD-766AA640075A Sat, 08 Mar 2025 09:24:00 -0400 EZH2 inhibition offers hope for fighting treatment-resistant cancers
